sources.title: The Girl Who Dared
sources.description: Title: The Girl Who Dared Summary: A young woman seeking adventure, and several other people have to outwit a mysterious killer on a remote island. Directed by: Howard Bretherton Actors: Lorna Gray, Peter Cookson, Grant Withers Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 5 August 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young woman seeking adventure, and several other people have to outwit a mysterious killer on a remote island.

sources.title: The Girl Who Dared
sources.description: Title: The Girl Who Dared Summary: OUT OF THE FOGS OF FEAR! STORMS OF TERROR!...came this amazing person...to thrill you! Directed by: Howard Bretherton Actors: Lorna Gray, Peter Cookson, Grant Withers Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 5 August 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 OUT OF THE FOGS OF FEAR! STORMS OF TERROR!...came this amazing person...to thrill you!

metadata.Plot: A young woman seeking adventure, and several other people have to outwit a mysterious killer on a remote island.
metadata.Actors: Lorna Gray, Peter Cookson, Grant Withers
